attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we urge prime minister to consider regularising people who have been here for 5 years or more, without criminal records, lawful and willing to abide by the rules of the land. this way, they can work legally, pay taxes and make other contributions and come out of the dark underworld of fear and exploits from some employers.

rejection.details: Please provide your full name. Also, we suggest you reprhase the title of your petition to ensure it is clear exactly what action you would like the government to take.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
